channel.title: Need help with client connection
channel.description: Ok so i have a wireless linksys thing. i use my labtop. i take the connection off there. i logged on my admin account went to portforwarded . changed it to my cmd ip4addres thing and everything. then i went to no-ip.org and got my addres all good and made. so i got the project insanity source and client i think . so i went client.java ctrl + f server then i went to the server and found all the 127.0.0 and all the other servers=0.0.0.0 and enterted my ip4addres, then my internet ip addres, then my server name from no-ip.org and none of this worked. im begging you please help me. is it because im using an wireless internet to my linksys. am i not suppose change them all or just the first server. please help!!!!!!!@!@!@!@!@@!@!@!

item.title: Need help with client connection
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

theres no java file but therre is a client.java and i tryed changing it to my no-ip name still didnt work. could it be because my router has a password. also its for a pi base

Read full topic

in thier are

and replace all the 127.0.01
with the ip you made on

item.title: Need help with client connection
